TestDescription.name: Grails database console
TestDescription.Description: In the development mode Grails provides a database console (available at [dark][bold]/dbconsole/[/bold][/dark]). This database console should not be available in the production environment as it leaks sensitive information about the database structure and permits executing SQL queries.
TestDescription.Impact: An attacker can execute SQL queries.
TestDescription.Recommendation: It's recommended to restrict access to the database console by running Grails in production mode.

Reference.database: Using the H2 Database Console in Grails
